blogPost.excerpt:
John Oliver explores the lost world of snack-sponsored video games, and pitches some ideas to today’s snack brands. 

Connect with Last Week Tonight online... 

Subscribe to the Last Week Tonight YouTube channel for more almost news as it almost happens: www.youtube.com/lastweektonight 

Find Last Week Tonight on Facebook like your mom would: www.facebook.com/lastweektonight 

Follow us on Twitter for news about jokes and jokes about news: www.twitter.com/lastweektonight

previous.excerpt:
🤖 Install Mech Arena for FREE here ✅ https://clik.cc/uIYUu and get a special starter pack to help kickstart your game!

SUPPORT the Channel ► https://www.patreon.com/TheActMan 

This is part 2 of my Halo Infinite Multiplayer review! Where I mostly talk about the positives and great innovations that 343i have made. Despite the lackluster content, Infinite is an exceptional Halo title. The foundation is laid and I can't wait to see what is built on top of it. 

____TIME STAMPS____
Introduction - 0:00
Infinite Is Fun - 3:37
Performance, Movement, Controls - 5:10
Visuals & Art Style - 8:21
Weapons & Balance - 10:29
Player Collision & Equipment - 20:53
Assault Rifle Starts Are... OK?? - 23:33
Vehicles - 25:38 
BTB, Maps & Map Design - 30:26
Conclusion - 37:06


Halo Infinite Is Underwhelming & Disappointing ➤ (Part 1/2)  www.youtube.com/watch?v=ARNBtGn70ww&t

✪ CONNECT WITH ME ✪
